attributes.description:
Sporty yet spacious and elegant this 2016 Volkswagen Passat 1.4 TSI Comfortline DSG is your perfect everyday run around!

-Excellent fuel consumption with average 17kms per liter
-Full Service History 134041kms + Spare Keys 
-Back seats fold completely down
-LCD media system
-Bluetooth
-Smash and Grab tint
-Bluetooth
-Steering wheel controls and so much more 
-Selling at R219 995

All trade ins are welcome and Finance available with all Major banks ! 

Contact one of our sales agents to get your finance in place today!
Richard 073-730-8305
Randal 072-685-4287
Shauwn 060-484-6476
Daniel 083-348-6125
Uzair 079 531 0532
